en.Name: Wilcox tactical device
en.Description: Compact laser and flashlight device for mounting on picatinny rails.

en.Name: FTX tactical device
en.Description: Compact laser and flashlight device for mounting on picatinny rails.

en.Name: PARACLETE APC
en.Description: Designed to allow the operator to gain immediate protection against high powered assault weapons, the Advanced Plate Carrier (APC) takes performance to new levels. Blending the functionality of a tactical vest with the simplicity of a plate carrier, the APC accommodates soft ballistic panels, Level III or IV hard armor plates and equipment pouches.

en.Name: PARACLETE APC (Multicam)
en.Description: Designed to allow the operator to gain immediate protection against high powered assault weapons, the Advanced Plate Carrier (APC) takes performance to new levels. Blending the functionality of a tactical vest with the simplicity of a plate carrier, the APC accommodates soft ballistic panels, Level III or IV hard armor plates and equipment pouches.

en.Name: MAGPUL MOE SL-M
en.Description: The MOE SL-M Carbine Stock is a drop-in replacement buttstock for AR15/M4 Mil-Spec carbine buffer tubes. It was specifically developed for ultra-compact, PDW-style military platform requirements and for users desiring a smaller, lighter stock.

en.Name: MAGPUL MOE SL-M FDE
en.Description: The MOE SL-M Carbine Stock is a drop-in replacement buttstock for AR15/M4 Mil-Spec carbine buffer tubes. It was specifically developed for ultra-compact, PDW-style military platform requirements and for users desiring a smaller, lighter stock.

en.Name: Ops-Core FAST MT MODX (Multicam)
en.Description: Ops-Core Fast ballistic helmet is popular in special forces all around the world. Can be modified with different components. Modded with accessories used by special forces.

en.Name: Ops-Core FAST MT MODX (Black)
en.Description: Ops-Core Fast ballistic helmet is popular in special forces all around the world. Can be modified with different components. Modded with accessories used by special forces.

en.Name: Classic US Helmet
en.Description: The classic US helmet, used in the US military since 1983. The helmet offers protection against shrapnel and other projectiles.

en.Name: M1 Vietnam Helmet
en.Description: Second World War vintage United States pattern M1 helmet, with minor modifications. For American troops, a cloth helmet cover was designed with a disruptive camouflage pattern.

en.Name: Lwrci Railskin
en.Description: The unique snake scale pattern provides positive non-slip grip even when wet or oily. Made of an extremely durable space-age polymer, they are nearly unbreakable.

en.Name: Lwrci Railskin OD
en.Description: The unique snake scale pattern provides positive non-slip grip even when wet or oily. Made of an extremely durable space-age polymer, they are nearly unbreakable.

en.Name: Lwrci Railskin FDE
en.Description: The unique snake scale pattern provides positive non-slip grip even when wet or oily. Made of an extremely durable space-age polymer, they are nearly unbreakable.

en.Name: KAC Rail Cover
en.Description: KAC iconic Ribbed Rail Panels have seen use all over the globe on US military M4 Carbines.

en.Name: Riser One mount
en.Description: Perfect mount to use with the Aimpoint Micro T-1 reflex sight.

en.Name: FAST Optic Riser
en.Description: The FAST Optic Riser securely elevates direct-to-rail mounted red dot optics with a standard lower 1/3 co-witness picatinny mount to a 2.26 optical center line. The FAST Optic Riser provides an elevated M1913 Picatinny platform for direct attachment of optics, such as EOTechÂ® EXPS, Vortex UH-1 and other lower 1/3 co-witness optics.

en.Name: FAST Micro
en.Description: The FAST Micro mount features built-in standard height back up iron sights that keep weapons uncluttered, without reducing capability.  Both front and rear BUIS are completely adjustable for windage and elevation. The front sight post can be removed so that the rear BUIS aperture can be used with a traditional front sight such as our FUSION fixed or folding sights  (if present), creating a more conventional sight radius. However, the built in front/rear BUIS is perfect for backup on super short PDW/SMG platforms where rail space is critical for mounting lights and lasers.

en.Name: PARACLETE SOHPC GEN2
en.Description: The SOHPC is PARACLETEs most successful hard plate carrier. It has been innovatively designed to provide unmatched comfort, protection and flexibility to meet the needs of every mission. Through the addition of an adjustable cummerbund and optional side plate pouches for hard armor plates, the SOHPC is the operators choice for todays missions.

en.Name: PARACLETE SOHPC GEN2 (Black)
en.Description: The SOHPC is PARACLETEs most successful hard plate carrier. It has been innovatively designed to provide unmatched comfort, protection and flexibility to meet the needs of every mission. Through the addition of an adjustable cummerbund and optional side plate pouches for hard armor plates, the SOHPC is the operators choice for todays missions.

en.Name: Wrapped 5.56x45 silencer
en.Description: This wrapped silencer is designed for installation on AR or AK based 5.56x45 rifles. It is made of stainless steel and has a special coating that reduces the sound of shots.

en.Name: KAC QDC-CQB 5.56x45 sound suppressor
en.Description: The Knight's Armament Company QDC 556 sound suppressor, designed for use with 5.56x45 caliber weapon systems. Can only be installed on the KAC QDC 3-Prong Flash Eliminator.

en.Name: Devil MLOK grip
en.Description: A very solid angled grip in pure steel. Crafted by Painter.

en.Name: Strike Industries LINK grip
en.Description: The Strike Industries LINK-CFG (Curved Fore Grip) design was derived from Cobra Tactical Fore Grip and features SIs LINK system which is mountable to both M-Lok and Keymod rails.

en.Name: Nomad Reflex Sight
en.Description: The Nomad Reflex Sight is a compact reflex sight for close range engagements. It features a 1x magnification and a 20mm objective lens. The sight is equipped with a 3 MOA red dot and has a 1 MOA click adjustment.

en.Name: Trijicon MRO Reflex Sight
en.Description: The Trijicon MRO (Miniature Rifle Optic) is a sealed, miniature reflex sight intended for use on rifles, carbines, and shotguns to provide fast target acquisition.

en.Name: Back Panel for vests
en.Description: Back panel for vests. Adds 5x5 cells for carrying various equipment.

en.Name: Back Panel for vests (Black)
en.Description: Back panel for vests. Adds 5x5 cells for carrying various equipment.

en.Name: Crye Precision AVS
en.Description: The AVS Harness is a primary base component of the AVS. It provides structural support and a mounting platform for a variety of AVSâ¢ components, which allows a wide range of different load-outs and configurations.

en.Name: Crye Precision AVS (Black)
en.Description: The AVS Harness is a primary base component of the AVS. It provides structural support and a mounting platform for a variety of AVSâ¢ components, which allows a wide range of different load-outs and configurations.

en.Name: MCU-2/P protective mask
en.Description: The MCU-2/P is a protective mask used by the United States Air Force and United States Navy, originally designed for the US Army as the XM-30 mask.

en.Name: Daniel Defense 5.56 magazine
en.Description: The DD Magazine is the only AR-15 magazine worthy of the Daniel Defense name and is built with the same quality and standards as their world-class firearms. Its 32-round capacity for 5.56mm and 300 Blackout rounds is the most notable enhancement while maintaining the same size as industry-standard 30-round magazines.

en.Name: SureFire X300U-A Flashlight
en.Description: SureFire X300U-A is a more powerful version of the SureFire X300U. It is a compact WeaponLight for pistols and long guns, featuring an ultra-high-output LED that delivers 1,000 lumens of blinding white light with a focused beam that provides significant reach and peripheral illumination.

en.Name: SureFire P1RZ-IB-DF Flashlight
en.Description: The P1RZ-IB-DF's click-on/off tailcap switch provides ergonomic, foolproof activation even under the most stressful conditions. With a high-strength aerospace aluminum body that is Mil-Spec hard anodized for extreme resistance to abrasion and corrosion, the P1RZ-IB-DF thrives in the harshest environments imaginable.

en.Name: INFORCE WMLX GEN 2
en.Description: WMLx White - Gen 2 sets the standard for balancing output, reliability, and value in a compact white-light capability for your rifle or carbine. Extensively proven amidst prolonged rapid firing, rough handling, and harsh conditions, it is a match for adversity in any clime or place.

en.Name: SureFire flashlight with pressure pad
en.Description: WMLx White - Gen 2 sets the standard for balancing output, reliability, and value in a compact white-light capability for your rifle or carbine. Extensively proven amidst prolonged rapid firing, rough handling, and harsh conditions, it is a match for adversity in any clime or place.

en.Name: SureFire flashlight with pressure pad (FDE)
en.Description: WMLx White - Gen 2 sets the standard for balancing output, reliability, and value in a compact white-light capability for your rifle or carbine. Extensively proven amidst prolonged rapid firing, rough handling, and harsh conditions, it is a match for adversity in any clime or place.

en.Name: Shapeshifter helmet with face cover
en.Description: Legendary helmet with face cover.

en.Name: DevTac Ronin ballistic helmet (v2)
en.Description: A Japan-based tactical helmet, manufactured by DevTac. Not used by any military or special forces. Just somehow happened to be in Tarkov for some frivolous price. Features a full protection of the whole head, but the armor class is not good enough to actually be useful in combat.

en.Name: DevTac Ronin ballistic helmet (v2.1)
en.Description: A Japan-based tactical helmet, manufactured by DevTac. Not used by any military or special forces. Just somehow happened to be in Tarkov for some frivolous price. Features a full protection of the whole head, but the armor class is not good enough to actually be useful in combat.

en.Name: Sig Sauer Tango4 1-4x24 scope
en.Description: Designed for MSR/AR and bolt action platforms, the TANGO4 1-4x24 mm riflescope is the ideal solution for CQB/mid-range tactical engagements, 3 Gun competitions and hunting with 4x times optical zoom and illumination in a 30mm one-piece maintube. Low dispersion (LD) glass provides industry leading optical clarity for any situation.

en.Name: TGC Ammo Pouch
en.Description: Ammunition storage pouch produced by Painter.

en.Name: TGC Tool Box
en.Description: Premium (TGC Certified) tool box to store all of your tools and workshop components, produced by Painter.

en.Name: TGC First Aid container
en.Description: A pouch for all your meds produced by Painter.

en.Name: AR-15 5.56x45 200mm barrel
en.Description: A 200mm barrel for AR-15 based weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo. Corresponds with standard service M4 CQBR barrel.

en.Name: AR-15 5.56x45 180mm barrel
en.Description: A 180mm barrel for AR-15 based weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo. Corresponds with standard service M4 CQBR barrel.

en.Name: Transparent 5.56 magazine
en.Description: Transparent magazine that holds Nato 5.56x45 ammunition.

en.Name: Ops-Core FAST MT MODXII (M90)
en.Description: Ops-Core Fast ballistic helmet is popular in special forces all around the world. Can be modified with different components. Modded with accessories used by special forces.

en.Name: Ops-Core FAST MT MODXII (Black)
en.Description: Ops-Core Fast ballistic helmet is popular in special forces all around the world. Can be modified with different components. Modded with accessories used by special forces.

en.Name: Ops-Core FAST MT MODXII (Multicam)
en.Description: Ops-Core Fast ballistic helmet is popular in special forces all around the world. Can be modified with different components. Modded with accessories used by special forces.

en.Name: SAKO Vertical Foregrip OD
en.Description: The SAKO Vertical Grip feature a soft touch overmolded gripping area, allowed for improved retention and comfort. Grips mount to standard Picatinny rails and feature a built-in dual O-ring, water tight storage.

en.Name: SAKO Vertical Foregrip
en.Description: The SAKO Vertical Grip feature a soft touch overmolded gripping area, allowed for improved retention and comfort. Grips mount to standard Picatinny rails and feature a built-in dual O-ring, water tight storage.

en.Name: M700 7.62x51 15 inch threaded barrel
en.Description: A 15 inch barrel for M700 7.62x51 NATO ammo.

en.Name: AK AKademia Bastion transparent dust cover
en.Description: The Bastion dust cover with an integrated Picatinny rail is compatible with all models of Kalashnikov automatic rifles and carbines based on the AK platform. Manufactured by AKademia. Transparent version.

en.Name: AR-15 Daniel Defense charging handle
en.Description: This Daniel Defense Grip-N-Rip AR-15 Ambidextrous Charging Handle is a lightweight, durable, and reliable method to charge your firearm.

en.Name: AR-15 Daniel Defense 15" handguard
en.Description: Daniel Defense MFR 15.0 M-LOK rail, which comes from the DDM4V7 PRO edition. Length of 15", it has everything you need on the battlefield.

en.Name: AR-15 Daniel Defense 15" handguard (FDE)
en.Description: Daniel Defense MFR 15.0 M-LOK rail, which comes from the DDM4V7 PRO edition. Length of 15", it has everything you need on the battlefield.

en.Name: Mystery Ranch NICE COMM 3 BVS frame system (Black)
en.Description: The NICE Frame special system for carrying oversized or heavy loads with an installed COMM 3 backpack for carrying radio systems. The COMM 3 main bay is designed for PRC117F or G, PRC119F, 152, or ASIP radios. The Hitchhiker and Daypack lid allows you to carry separate gear if needed. The modular NICE COMM 3 system is ready to adapt to changing tasks. An extremely rare thing, for which a real hunt is conducted in Tarkov.

en.Name: Mystery Ranch NICE COMM 3 BVS frame system (M90)
en.Description: The NICE Frame special system for carrying oversized or heavy loads with an installed COMM 3 backpack for carrying radio systems. The COMM 3 main bay is designed for PRC117F or G, PRC119F, 152, or ASIP radios. The Hitchhiker and Daypack lid allows you to carry separate gear if needed. The modular NICE COMM 3 system is ready to adapt to changing tasks. An extremely rare thing, for which a real hunt is conducted in Tarkov.

en.Name: AR-15 BCM MCMR-10 handguard (FDE)
en.Description: Featuring the same industry leading barrel nut and lock up design as originally introduced on BCM's evolutionary KMR handguard, the MCMR Series of handguards gives the shooter modularity in the M-LOK platform.

en.Name: AR-15 BCM MCMR-10 handguard
en.Description: Featuring the same industry leading barrel nut and lock up design as originally introduced on BCM's evolutionary KMR handguard, the MCMR Series of handguards gives the shooter modularity in the M-LOK platform.

en.Name: AR-15 Strike Industries Advanced Receiver Extension buffer tube with adapter
en.Description: The Advanced Receiver Extension buffer tube with adapter, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine or rifle. The buffer tube has a distinctive scalloping that decreases friction with the stock and reduces weight while retaining strength in areas that get the most stress. Manufactured by Strike Industries.

en.Name: Scott FM3 protective mask
en.Description: Approved to EN 136 Class 3, the highest standard for safety.

en.Name: GP-9 protective mask
en.Description: The GP-9 features a removable oral-nasal cup, panoramic lens, intercom, voice diaphragm, and a 40mm GOST thread, making it superior to the previous GP-7V mask.

en.Name: Batman figurine
en.Description: A figurine of Batman, a superhero of the American comic book publisher DC Comics, produced by Prime 1 Studio. Batman is the secret identity of Bruce Wayne, an American billionaire, industrialist, and philanthropist.

en.Name: Magpul FDE MOE2 pistol grip (FDE)
en.Description: The polymer Magpul MOE2 pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 pistol grips. Thanks to the ergonomic shape and anti-slip texture, it makes the weapon grip and control more comfortably. The inside of the grip contains free space for spare parts, tools, batteries, and an accessories kit. Comes in black and flat dark earth.

en.Name: Magpul MOE2 pistol grip (Black)
en.Description: The polymer Magpul MOE2 pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 pistol grips. Thanks to the ergonomic shape and anti-slip texture, it makes the weapon grip and control more comfortably. The inside of the grip contains free space for spare parts, tools, batteries, and an accessories kit. Comes in black and flat dark earth.

en.Name: M16 Daniel Defense 14" handguard
en.Description: Daniel Defense MFR 14.0 M-LOK rail, which comes from the DDM4V7 PRO edition. Length of 14", it has everything you need on the battlefield.

en.Name: M16 Daniel Defense 14" handguard
en.Description: Daniel Defense MFR 14.0 M-LOK rail, which comes from the DDM4V7 PRO edition. Length of 14", it has everything you need on the battlefield.

en.Name: M16 5.56x45 18" barrel
en.Description: A 18" for M16 5.56x45 NATO ammo.

en.Name: M16 5.56x45 20" barrel
en.Description: A 20" for M16 5.56x45 NATO ammo.

en.Name: TGC combat belt (Brown)
en.Description: Advanced combat belt with a lightweight construction and a comfortable fit. The belt is equipped with a quick-release buckle and a system of additional pouches for carrying equipment. The belt is made of durable materials and is designed for long-term use in harsh conditions.

en.Name: TGC combat belt (Black)
en.Description: Advanced combat belt with a lightweight construction and a comfortable fit. The belt is equipped with a quick-release buckle and a system of additional pouches for carrying equipment. The belt is made of durable materials and is designed for long-term use in harsh conditions.

en.Name: Magpul 5.56/7.62 kitted magazine
en.Description: 30-round magazine for 5.56x45 and 7.62x35 rounds. The magazine is equipped with a Magpul Ranger assist puller.

en.Name: MSA TC2000 ACH MICH helmet
en.Description: The MICH was originally part of a series of combat helmets designed for the U.S. Army Special Operations Command as a replacement for the PASGT helmet and the various non-ballistic helmets solely within those units.

en.Name: AR-15 M16 stock
en.Description: M16 stock made by Colt for AR-15 and compatible weapons.

en.Name: Crye Precision JPC
en.Description: The JPC is a lightweight and minimal vest designed for maximum mobility, weight savings, and packability.

en.Name: Back Panel for vests
en.Description: Back panel for vests. Adds 5x5 cells for carrying various equipment.

en.Name: Back Panel for vests
en.Description: Back panel for vests. Adds 5x5 cells for carrying various equipment.

en.Name: TGC Police Belt
en.Description: Utility belt for police units. The belt is equipped with a quick-release buckle and a system of additional pouches for carrying equipment. The belt is made of durable materials and is designed for long-term use in harsh conditions.

en.Name: TGC M-LOK 2.8 inch rail
en.Description: Low profile M-LOK 2.8 inch rail created by Painter, allows installation of additional equipment on the handguards equipped with an M-LOK interface.

en.Name: Gemtech ONE-S multi-caliber sound suppressor
en.Description: Gemtech ONE-S (mini) sound suppressor designed for use with a 7.62x51 NATO, but also compatible with a most popular rifle calibers. Can only be installed on compatible devices.

en.Name: AR-15 ZipLine handguard
en.Description: Legendary blueprint from a specific game. Fits AR-15 and compatible weapons.

en.Name: AR-15 ZipLine reciever
en.Description: Legendary blueprint from a specific game. Fits AR-15 and compatible weapons.

en.Name: AR-15 ZipLine pistol grip
en.Description: Legendary blueprint from a specific game. Fits AR-15 and compatible weapons.

en.Name: AR-15 ZipLine stock
en.Description: Legendary blueprint from a specific game. Fits AR-15 and compatible weapons.

en.Name: TGC MULE combat belt
en.Description: Large ergonomic belt for military units. The belt is equipped with a quick-release buckle and a system of additional pouches for carrying equipment. The belt is made of durable materials and is designed for long-term use in harsh conditions.

en.Name: TGC MULE combat belt (Black)
en.Description: Large ergonomic belt for military units. The belt is equipped with a quick-release buckle and a system of additional pouches for carrying equipment. The belt is made of durable materials and is designed for long-term use in harsh conditions.

en.Name: Surefire M640U-BK-PRO Flashlight
en.Description: With its recoil-proof, ultra-high-output LED delivering 1000 lumens of blinding white light, the Scout Light Pro is ready for action. Its proprietary TIR lens shapes the light into a far-reaching beam with ample surround light for exceptional peripheral vision, making it ideal for medium to longer-range applications. SureFires new Low-Profile Mount (LPM) delivers unprecedented versatility, allowing the user to optimize the lights position relative to the rail.

en.Name: Scalarworks LEAP/Scope mount
en.Description: Designed for shooters who want the lightest, strongest, and most compact quick-detach red dot sight mount possible. The LEAP/01 redefines the standard for mounting your Aimpoint Micro T-2 footprint compatible optic to your AR-15 Picatinny top rail.

en.Name: BOPE Beret
en.Description: What is a Brazilian police beret doing here in Russia?

en.Name: AR-15 M16 M203 heat shield handguard
en.Description: Heat shield handguard for M16A4 and M4A1 with M203 grenade launcher.

en.Name: Ghost facecover
en.Description: This ghost mask is made from soft cotton stretch fabric that is moisture-wicking, windproof, sweat-wicking, and UV resistant.

en.Name: HK MP7 TGC stock
en.Description: The TGC branded MP7 stock offers increased stability and ergonomics.

en.Name: HK MP7 TGC stock buffer tube
en.Description: The TGC branded MP7 stock enables you to mount AR style stocks on your MP7.

en.Name: HK MP7 TGC Stelio 4.6x30 sound suppressor
en.Description: Stelio is a 4.6x30 mm suppressor produced by Painter (TGC).

en.Name: HK MP7 TGC Stelio S 4.6x30 sound suppressor
en.Description: Stelio is a 4.6x30 mm suppressor produced by Painter (TGC).

en.Name: HK MP7 4.6x30 60-round magazine
en.Description: 60-round 4.6x30 magazine for MP7.

en.Name: CGPC3 TQS (Green)
en.Description: A low-profile, lightweight and fully modular plate carrier made in the Czech Republic. With its sturdy construction and advanced materials, it offers reliable defense against ballistic threats and fragmentation, while its Tube Quick System allows for comfortable and silent unfastening.

en.Name: CGPC3 TQS (Tan)
en.Description: A low-profile, lightweight and fully modular plate carrier made in the Czech Republic. With its sturdy construction and advanced materials, it offers reliable defense against ballistic threats and fragmentation, while its Tube Quick System allows for comfortable and silent unfastening.
